package.name: lesslinux-drivetools
package.install: cd mounttools2 mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools/images mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications install -m 0644 winfiles.txt ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools install -m 0755 vdiskimage-wrapper.sh ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools install -m 0755 ddrescueimage-wrapper.sh ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools for f in llpm_drives llpm_mount mmmm2.sh initial_system_check.sh deletedisk.sh \ clonedisk.sh chntpwgui.sh resetshell.sh usbinstall.sh mountall.sh \ mountnet.sh runx11vnc.sh runsmbd.sh xmldrivelist.sh llmounthelper.sh \ mmmmng.sh llmountandopen.sh blobinstall.sh vdiskimage.sh ddrescueimage.sh \ photorec-sorter.sh history-extractor.sh jumplist-extractor.sh search-caches.sh batch-install.sh \ pst-importer.sh qemustarter.sh vshadowgui.sh accesspoint.sh ; do install -m 0755 ${f} ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin done for f in llpm_drives initial_system_check deletedisk clonedisk chntpwgui \ resetshell usbinstall mountall mountnet runx11vnc runsmbd blobinstall \ vdiskimage ddrescueimage photorec-sorter history-extractor jumplist-extractor \ search-caches pst-importer qemustarter vshadowgui accesspoint LessLinuxInstaller ; do install -m 0644 ${f}.xml ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools done for f in llpm_drives MfsDiskDrive MfsSinglePartition MfsTranslator MfsSamDatabase \ MfsRegistryDatabase MmmmDriveList mmmm initial_system_check deletedisk \ clonedisk chntpwgui resetshell usbinstall mountall mountnet runx11vnc llmounthelper ddrescueimage \ runsmbd XmlDriveList xmldrivelist_ blobinstall vdiskimage MfsSysProfile \ photorec-sorter history-extractor jumplist-extractor search-caches pst-importer \ qemustarter vshadowgui accesspoint LessLinuxInstaller batch-install assistant ; do install -m 0755 ${f}.rb ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools done install -m 0644 images/*.png ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools/images install -m 0755 jl.pl ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools install -m 0644 JumpList.pm ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools mv ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools/xmldrivelist_.rb \ ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/drivetools/xmldrivelist.rb for f in *.desktop ; do install -m 0644 $f ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications done
